    Author:
    Maxime VERNUSSET

                           throws ConflictingAsymmetricEncryptionAlgorithmsException
        Constructor.

        algo - asymmetric algorithm to use
        keyPair - private/public key pair of instance
        correspondentPublicKey - Public key of correspondent to be able to encrypt messages to his attention
